descript.abstract: The PLSS First Division is commonly the section. This is the first set of divisions for a PLSS Township.
descript.purpose: to provide the polygons for the first divisions of the PLSS Township

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.0.1770

citeinfo.origin: REQUIRED: The name of an organization or individual that developed the data set.
citeinfo.pubdate: REQUIRED: The date when the data set is published or otherwise made available for release.
citeinfo.title: PLSSFirstDivision

timeperd.current: REQUIRED: The basis on which the time period of content information is determined.

sngdate.caldate: REQUIRED: The year (and optionally month, or month and day) for which the data set corresponds to the ground.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: This is a code to indicate whether the first division is a duplicated area or identifier
This is a unique identifier for the first division that is built by appending the first division elements on the Township identifier.
This is the number, letter or designator for the first division of the PLSS Township
This is the first division type as a text field
This is the type of first division and is commonly the section but may be a lot, parcel, tract or other division.

This is the unique identifier for the PLSS Township in which the first division is located. Concatenation of the principal meridian, township, range, and duplication code that form a unique identifier for the township.
Code for the type of special survey typically from the codes for the BLM data collection. Used in this feature to indicate if the feature is unsurveyed or unprotracted.
The description of the survey type code. There may be a description of the survey type, or survey status in the case of this feature, without a code.

enttyp.enttypd: The PLSS First Division is commonly the section. This is the first set of divisions for a PLSS Township.

attr.attrdef: Length of feature in internal units.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: This is the label for the first division that is used for cartographic of web display purposes

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows Server 2008 R2 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.0.2414
dataIdInfo.idPurp: to provide the polygons for the first divisions of the PLSS Township
dataIdInfo.idAbs: The PLSS First Division is commonly the section. This is the first set of divisions for a PLSS Township.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntorgp.cntper: REQUIRED: The person responsible for the metadata information.
cntorgp.cntorg: REQUIRED: The organization responsible for the metadata information.

cntaddr.addrtype: REQUIRED: The mailing and/or physical address for the organization or individual.
cntaddr.city: REQUIRED: The city of the address.
cntaddr.state: REQUIRED: The state or province of the address.
cntaddr.postal: REQUIRED: The ZIP or other postal code of the address.

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates
